mapper.select: SELECT f.id as folderId, f.name as folderName, f.program_id as programId, t.name as programName FROM folder f LEFT JOIN program t ON f.program_id = t.id WHERE f.program_id = #{programId};
SELECT f.id as folderId, f.name as folderName, f.program_id as programId, t.name as programName FROM folder f LEFT JOIN program t ON f.program_id = t.id WHERE f.id != 1;
